meaning_str.bing:
n. 奖；奖金；奖品；奖学金
v. 授予；给予奖励；判给
网络. 奖项；获奖；奖赏

授予；颁发（奖项、荣誉）；裁决给予（权利、财产）；奖励；判给
奖；（毕业证书等的）奖项；奖金；奖励；荣誉；赔偿金；补偿；（法官或仲裁人的）裁决；（由法院授予的）赔偿额；（赔偿）裁决；奖品；奖状

1.en: At a press conference, Obama said he was humbled by the decision of the committee to award him the prize.
1.cn: 在新闻发布会上，奥巴马称他对于获颁这一奖项无比荣幸。

2.en: If there was an award for anti-achievements in town planning, Moscow officials would be in the front line.
2.cn: 如果存在城市规划反成就奖的话，那么莫斯科市官方必然处于领先集团。

3.en: Justin Bieber, who took home the award for best male video, was all over his girlfriend, Selena Gomez, at the awards.
3.cn: 贾斯汀·比伯在典礼上凌驾于女朋友赛琳娜·戈麦斯之上，赢得了最佳男歌手录像奖。。

0.en: Do you really want an award you didn't win?
0.cn: 你想要一个不属于你的奖杯吗？

1.en: You mean like for award shows? Some of them.
1.cn: 你是指像颁奖典礼之后？ 有些是。

2.en: When I won the National Book Award. Nancy was a fan.
2.cn: 当我得国家图书奖的时候。南茜是书迷。

3.en: Wow, you won the Stevenson award? Yes. In fact, I am the youngest person ever to win it.
3.cn: 哇，你赢了史蒂文森奖？是的，事实上我是历史上年纪最小的获奖人。

4.en: Bert? I wanted to let you know that I read your research, and your award is well deserved. Thanks.
4.cn: 伯特？我想让你知道，我读了你的论文，你拿奖实至名归。谢谢。

5.en: I won? You won. I won. This is astonishing. Not that I won the award no one deserves it more.
5.cn: 我得奖了？你得奖了。我得奖啦。太让我感到意外了，不是意外得了奖，没人比我更有资格。

6.en: I've been published in peer-reviewed journals, I received a dissertation of the year award for experimental particle physics.
6.cn: 我在同行评审刊物里发表过论文，我在实验粒子物理学方面获得过年度专题论文奖。

7.en: Hey, Sheldon. I was up in the administration office, and I happened to overhear the name of the winner of this year's Chancellor's Award for Science.
7.cn: 谢尔顿，我刚走过行政办公室时无意中听到了今年大学科学奖得奖人的名字。

8.en: Today I have decided to give an award to the hardest working person in the country. I wonder who that will be. It certainly won't be you, Darling.
8.cn: 今天，我决定要颁一个奖给我们国家工作最努力的人。我在想会是谁呢。亲爱的，肯定不会是你！

9.en: Today I have decided to give an award to the hardest working person in the country. I wonder who that will be. It certainly won't be you, Darling.
9.cn: 今天，我决定要颁一个奖给我们国家工作最努力的人。我在想会是谁呢。亲爱的，肯定不会是你！

10.en: This has been the experience of two remarkable organizations, The Duke of Edinburgh's Award and the Prince's Trust, which are sixty and forty years old this year.
10.cn: 有两个杰出的机构就做到了这一点。爱丁堡公爵奖和王子信托基金会，它们分别已有60年和40年的历史了。

11.en: So, will August Pullman please come up here to receive this award?
11.cn: 下面，请奥吉斯特·普尔曼同学上台接受这一奖项。

12.en: No. I want an award I did win. But nobody's giving me any of those.
12.cn: 不，我想要一个属于我的奖杯，但没有人愿意让我得奖。

13.en: Oh my God you stole her award. No, no. No, I'm accepting it on her behalf.
13.cn: 我的天啊，你偷走她的奖杯。不，我代表她收下它。

14.en: Hard day? First the medical award, now this? Yeah. Some guys are just lucky, I guess.
14.cn: 辛苦了，先是医学大奖，然后是这个。是呀，我猜有些人天生好运。

15.en: I'm not accepting the award. Why not? Turns out the great Sheldon Cooper has stage fright.
15.cn: 我不接受奖项了。为什么？因为伟大的谢尔顿居然会怯场。

16.en: Joey no, this is wrong. You have to take it back, okay? You don't want to win an award this way.
16.cn: 这是不对的，你得把它还回去，你不会想这样把奖杯拿回家。

17.en: This is the Queen's award for industry. Thank you. Keep up the good work. Three cheers for Miss Rabbit.
17.cn: 这是女王为工业颁发的奖项！谢谢！继续保持优秀的工作，让我们给兔子小姐三声欢呼！

18.en: Final award this morning is the Henry Ward Beecher medal to honor students who have been notable or exemplary.
18.cn: 今天的最后一个奖项是亨利沃德比彻奖牌，将它授予一位表现突出，以身作则的学生。

19.en: Uh huh. And if I don't want to forfeit the award? Well, you've got that tied up in a neat little bow. All right. Thank you.
19.cn: 嗯。如果我不想放弃奖项呢？好， 您现在是箭在弦上，不得不发。好吧，谢谢。
